content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Plate Mine at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=43.5, y=-80.5) that picks up items from the burner mining drill
-  Three wooden chests (positions x=44.5, y=-81.5; x=45.5, y=-80.5; x=43.5, y=-79.5) that store items

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
-  Ensure the entity contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction
-  Make sure the entity is not blocked or waiting for space in the destination
### Errors when inserting items into a furnace
-  Ensure you have the item you are trying to insert in your inventory before attempting insertion
### Errors when placing entities
-  No errors of this type were encountered in the given execution steps
### Errors when moving to a position
-  No errors of this type were encountered in the given execution steps
### Errors when harvesting resources
-  No errors of this type were encountered in the given execution steps
